Document.name: Ski Pass Map
Document.description:
Updated for 2023-2024.
Send through updates or comments here: https://www.reddit.com/r/skiing/comments/15tzb5q/google_map_with_all_epic_ikon_mc_ikon_mc_indy/?utm_source=share&utm_medium=web2x&context=3

Placemark.name: Boston Mills and Brandywine Ski Areas
Rusutsu Ski Resort ルスツリゾート イーストセンターステーション
Hakuba Valley Kashimayari Ski Resort
Placemark.description:
Hakuba Valley offers 5 consecutive days across 9 resorts:
- Jiigatake Snow Resort
- Kashimayari Ski Resort
- ABLE Hakuba Goryu
- Hakuba47 Winter Sports Park
- Hakuba Happo-one Snow Resort
- Hakuba Iwatake Snow Field
- Tsugaike Kogen Snow Resort
- Hakuba Norikura Onsen Snow Resort
- Hakuba Cortina Snow Resort
